code: import React,{useState}from'react';import"./header.css";import logo from"./store.png";import person from"./face.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{name,middle}=_ref;const[dark,setDark]=useState(true);const toggleDarkMode=()=>{setDark(!dark);document.body.classList.toggle('dark-theme',dark);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"\u041B\u043E\u0433\u043E\u0442\u0438\u043F",style:{width:'35px',height:'35px',marginRight:'15px'}}),name]}),middle,/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{onClick:()=>toggleDarkMode(),className:dark?'fa fa-moon-o darktheme':'fa fa-sun-o darktheme'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:person,alt:"\u0410\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0430\u0440",style:{fontSize:'25px',color:'white',opacity:'70%'}})})]})]});};export default Header;
